title: Akira Kobayashi
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809063402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809063402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Akira Kobayashi**

Akira Kobayashi was born in Japan, where he worked as a typeface designer until 2001. Since 2001, he has been the Type Director at [Linotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809063402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Linotype).

His typefaces at Linotype have included: [FF Clifford](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809063402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FF%20Clifford), [FF Acanthus](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809063402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FF%20Acanthus), [Conrad](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809063402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Conrad), [Zapfino Extra](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809063402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Zapfino%20Extra) (with [Hermann Zapf](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809063402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hermann%20Zapf)), [Optima nova](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809063402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Optima%20nova) (with [Hermann Zapf](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809063402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hermann%20Zapf)), [Palatino nova](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809063402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Palatino%20nova) (with [Hermann Zapf](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809063402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hermann%20Zapf)), [Palatino Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809063402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Palatino%20Sans) (with [Hermann Zapf](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809063402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hermann%20Zapf)), and [Avenir Next](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809063402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Avenir%20Next) (with [Adrian Frutiger](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809063402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Adrian%20Frutiger)). Additionally, he designed the new [Linotype Office Alliance](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809063402/http:/www.linotype.com/3132/linotypeofficealliance.html) fonts.

He also has designed several typefaces for [TypeBank](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809063402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/TypeBank), [ITC](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809063402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ITC), [FontFont](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809063402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontFont), and [Adobe](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809063402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Adobe).
author: filip blazek
